text: David Thomas Charles Davies (born 27 July 1970) is a British politician. He has been Secretary of State for Wales since 2022 and the Member of Parliament (MP) for Monmouth since 2005. He is a member of the Conservative Party. He is a critic of the European Union and supported Brexit. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs Category:UK MPs 2005–2010 Category:UK MPs 2010–2015 Category:UK MPs 2015–2017 Category:UK MPs 2017–2019 Category:UK MPs 2019–2024 Category:Politicians from London Category:Secretaries of State for Wales Category:Members of the British House of Commons for Welsh constituencies
